resources.string: Hello, I`m Kang Seok Joo\n\nThis is a splash/intro screen.
*This application can be replaced in English according to system settings.
Please check the consent item to enter the email information you are signing up for.
It`s linked to Naver. Please wait a moment.
It`s linked to Kakao. Please wait a moment.
Please check the password you entered.
This is not a valid E-Mail format. Please try again.
This email is already in use. Sign in, please.!
Please enter the password by mixing English, numbers, and special characters at least 8 to 15 digits.
Please enter the password without spaces.
Please mix English, numbers, and special characters.
Your join was successful. Congratulations on joining us!
